body:
Hey everyone!

I realised, after browsing the forums, that I actually have never made an AMA!

So, go ahead, ask me anything!
body_tagged:
Hey everyone!

I realised, after browsing the forums, that I actually have never made an AMA!

So, go ahead, ask me anything!
title: My first AMA!

Why are you so awesome?

replies.body:
Favourite sport? Stand up paddling.
Favourite food? CHOCOLATE
Favourite animal? Doggies, dragons and stuff like that.
Why did you change your name to FrozenSolstice? Hmm. Well, I wanted a change from __SkyGirl__9 because people thought I was a SkythekidRS fangirl. It wasn't all that original either. FrozenSolstice is alot less generic. Please credit Jake for helping to much with the username decision :D

replies.body:
What's your favorite thing to do on Avicus?
When was the last time you used a pencil sharpener?
What object is immediately behind you? (besides your chair :P)
What is your favorite color?

:D

replies.body:
What's your favorite thing to do on Avicus? Play Nebula, socialise and moderate c:
When was the last time you used a pencil sharpener? Two days ago... I sharpened practically all my pencils in my pencil-case. Then they were all different lengths and my OCD spazzed... 
What object is immediately behind you? (besides your chair :P) Umm. A road :P
What is your favorite color? Icy blue.

replies.body:
@Pyrocumulus

do you like animals? Love 'em!

global warming is fun? No.

what did you do to get ready for your interview? (drink water, deep breaths, eat, etc) Went to the toilet multiple times, deep breaths, had a glass of water next to me all the time... And blow on my thumb :)
